title: Three Types of Cognitive Load
description: An interactive visualization demonstrating how intrinsic, extraneous, and germane cognitive load compete for limited working memory capacity. Includes side-by-side comparison of poor vs. good instructional design.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Cognitive Load Theory
Instructional Design
Learning Science
Working Memory
Educational Psychology
relation: Part of the Automating Instructional Design intelligent textbook
coverage: Introduction to Cognitive Load Theory concepts for instructional designers
learningObjective: Help learners distinguish between intrinsic, extraneous, and germane cognitive load and understand their relationships
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of three types of cognitive load
Explore three types of cognitive load through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of three types of cognitive load to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on three types of cognitive load
